comments:
When starting a new Java project in Eclipse 3.2 M6 and then writing a simple Hello World program the program can't be run. It works fine in 3.2 M5a. The following error is reported:

An internal error occurred during: "Launching".

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6

java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=sv_SE
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86
